channel.title: How to fix a js5connect problem on a 508 client
channel.description: everytime i try to run a 508 client it says : error-game-js5connect how do i fix this problem bc, i want to make a 508 server. i can make a 317 and run that client fine. and i can run a 508 server just not a client.

item.title: How to fix a js5connect problem on a 508 client
item.dc:creator: @Realm_of_Dark Realm of Dark
item.description:
@Realm_of_Dark wrote:

did you make sure to install the 508 cache?

also, make sure the IP your client connects to is viable (try just doing 127.0.0.1 (thatâ€™s local client)).

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix a js5connect problem on a 508 client
